Accordion

This is the Accordion component. It's an example.

Vivamus magna justo, lacinia eget consectetur sed, convallis at tellus. Proin eget tortor risus. Donec rutrum congue leo eget malesuada. Donec sollicitudin molestie malesuada. Curabitur non nulla sit amet nisl tempus convallis quis ac lectus.

Card List

This a collection (or list) of Cards. Cards will typically be displayed in a group. This component demonstrates the group styles.

Gallery Carousel

This is the Gallery Carousel component. It uses the Slick library. For this component to work, the Slick min.js and .css files must be included.

Optional Title

Optional summary text, turpis at luctus finibus, erat lectus convallis velit, at sodales purus lacus quis magna. Curabitur imperdiet sapien libero, fringilla ullamcorper nibh ullamcorper vitae. Proin sed luctus augue.

  • Item 1. Image media item’s alt text displayed as overlay on hover. If no alt text, “Media Name” value displayed.

  • Item 2. Image media item’s alt text displayed as overlay on hover. If no alt text, “Media Name” value displayed.

  • Item 3. Image media item’s alt text displayed as overlay on hover. If no alt text, “Media Name” value displayed.

  • Item 4. Image media item’s alt text displayed as overlay on hover. If no alt text, “Media Name” value displayed.

  • Item 5. Image media item’s alt text displayed as overlay on hover. If no alt text, “Media Name” value displayed.

  • Item 6. Image media item’s alt text displayed as overlay on hover. If no alt text, “Media Name” value displayed.

  • Item 7. Image media item’s alt text displayed as overlay on hover. If no alt text, “Media Name” value displayed.

  • Item 8. Image media item’s alt text displayed as overlay on hover. If no alt text, “Media Name” value displayed.

Gallery Lightbox

This is the Gallery Lightbox component. It uses the Colorbox library/module. For this component to work, the Colorbox min.js file, .css file, and image files must be included.

Media Item

This component can accepts a video embed or image and includes a caption.

Image media item caption. Nulla vitae elit libero, a pharetra augue. Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et. Vestibulum id ligula porta felis euismod semper.

Messages

Default drupal messages.

Success

Your content was successfully updated.

Warning

Your updates may contain issues.

Error

The form contains errors. Try again.
